abstract: Building Blocks column; work has begun on St Nicholas National Shrine near National September 11 Memorial on World Trade Center site after years of controversy; Greek Orthodox church and nondenominational bereavement center will be domed structure with white marble veneer that will glow at night.
lead_paragraph: Construction has begun in Lower Manhattan on the St. Nicholas National Shrine, a Greek Orthodox church and nondenominational bereavement center whose dome will be illuminated at night.

headline.main: Church, Rising at Trade Center Site, Will Glow Where Darkness Fell
headline.print_headline: Church, Rising at Trade Center Site, Will Glow Where Darkness Fell

snippet: Construction has begun in Lower Manhattan on the St. Nicholas National Shrine, a Greek Orthodox church and nondenominational bereavement center whose dome will be illuminated at night.

keywords.value: St Nicholas National Shrine at the World Trade Center (Manhattan, NY)
